title: aleksfinder
author: aleksfinder
content: Like tittles says How to find a specific bitcoin transaction tx by just time & date & full BTC amount? since I don't have the Bitcoin address nor the TX only amount & date? Thank you !!

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: blockchair.com can do it.As an example all the transactions on Dec 31st using UTC time: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transactions?q=time(2022-12-31)#You can have multiple queries to get what you are looking for.Just about anything in their API you can query through the web.Take a look here: https://github.com/Blockchair/Blockchair.Support/blob/master/API.md-Dave

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: DaveF on January 12, 2023, 02:55:47 AMblockchair.com can do it.As an example all the transactions on Dec 31st using UTC time: https://blockchair.com/bitcoin/transactions?q=time(2022-12-31)#Alternative: Bitcoin block data (728 GB): inputs, outputs and transactions. Find the day you're looking for, open it in a spreadsheet and search the time/amount.
